description: Panel de demo del Gemelo Digital. Vista simulada. Pesta√±a urbanismo.

en.comparativa-pib_conf_description: Gross Domestic Product of Valencia compared to Spain for the last modeled year.
en.congestion-del-trafico_conf_description: Average level of traffic congestion on the roads of Valencia. It updates with district and day type selectors.
en.distribucion-ocupacion-parking_conf_desc: Shows how parking occupancy is distributed over time in terms of flat demand vs. demand peaks. It shows what percentage of the day the parking is at maximum occupancy and how much at minimum. It updates with district and day type selectors.
en.estado-esperado_conf_tittle: Expected State of Services in Valencia
en.estado-esperado_description: Map of Valencia showing the usual state of parking lots and the usual traffic flow. It updates according to district and day type selectors (working days, Saturdays, Sundays). By default, it shows the state for working days.
en.horas-pico-valle-parkings_conf_descripti: Detail of peak and off-peak hours for all parking lots, with two daily periods (morning and afternoon).
en.i18n_gemelo-digital-vista-identidad-city: Digital Twin Demo Panel - Urbanism Tab

Publicly accessible green areas per 100,000 inhabitants. Green spaces include parks, gardens, recreational areas, natural areas, or other open green spaces. It is calculated as the total area of green spaces in the city (numerator), divided by each 100,000 inhabitants (denominator). The result is expressed as hectares per 100,000 inhabitants.

Surface area of the Municipality for the last modeled year. Observations: The surface area comes from the calculation of the area defined by the municipal boundaries registered in SIGESPA. Annual variations may be observed due to modifications in the surface area of the Port of Valencia or corrections in the municipal boundaries of the city.

Map of Valencia showing the expected state of the main services: parking occupancy level, traffic congestion level, and public transport usage. It updates according to district and day type selectors (workdays, Saturdays, Sundays). By default, it shows the state for workdays.
Information on 3 fundamental urban parameters: green areas (hectares) per 100,000 inhabitants; residential density (per square kilometer); urban area by neighborhoods
Values of the main air quality indicators for the different districts of Valencia

Ratio between the number of people in the reference year and the surface area of the city of Valencia, excluding the surface area of the port and the Albufera lake. It represents the average number of people per square kilometer of the potentially habitable surface area of the city.
en.ibi-medio_conf_description: Average Property Tax (IBI) of Valencia for the last modeled year.
en.inflacion_conf_description: Inflation rate for the last modeled year.
en.ocupacion-de-los-parkings_conf_descripti: Average occupancy level of parking lots in Valencia. It updates with district and day type selectors.
en.ocupacion-parkings_conf_description: Distribution of parking occupancy by hour of the day. It updates with district and day type selectors.
en.presupuesto-anual_conf_description: Annual budget of Valencia for the last modeled year.
en.ranking-parking_conf_description: Ranking of parking lots with a double ordering according to the average daily occupancy: from most to least saturated and from least to most saturated.
en.tasa-desempleo_conf_description: Percentage representing the total number of unemployed people relative to the active population for Valencia for the last modeled year.
en.titulados-superiores_conf_description: Number of higher education graduates per 100,000 inhabitants for Valencia for the last modeled year.
en.uso-del-transporte-publico_conf_descript: Usage level of public transport in Valencia, according to the number of trips on different EMT lines. It updates with district and day type selectors.
en.vista-identidad_conf_description: The identity view is a set of indicators that best characterize a city within the study scope from a manager's perspective. It is a real, non-simulated view, but new, designed and optimized to be the best representation of the city, the zero-reference scenario. It is the starting point of the twin, as it determines the data sets and models that will be used to generate the simulated views.

es.vista-identidad_conf_description: La vista identidad es aquel conjunto de indicadores que mejor caracterizan una ciudad dentro del √°mbito de estudio y para el punto de vista de un gestor.
